metadata.title: Tuesday, 26th November, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    how many international treaties, under the African Union, have been signed by Zambia from 2001 to-date;
(b)    of the Treaties signed, how many have been ratified; and
(c)    of the ratified Treaties, how many have been domesticated.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when construction of Sesheke Trades Training Institute will commence;
(b)    when construction works will be completed; and
(c)    what interim measures the Government has taken for the training of school leavers in the Constituency before construction of the Training Institute.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    of the roads earmarked for construction under the Link Zambia 8000 Road Project, how many have been completed to-date;
(b)    why the Government has left out a 68km stretch of the Katunda-Lukulu-Mumbezhi Road (Lukulu Boma to Watopa Bridge) in its maintenance Programme; and

(c)    when the Government will start the routine maintenance of the Katunda-Lukulu Road which is in a very bad state. QUESTION FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W9    Mr Simfukwe (Mbala) - to ask the Minister of Labour and Social Security:
(a)    how many formal jobs were created, country-wide, from September, 2011 to September, 2013, Constituency by Constituency;
(b)    what the types of jobs created are; and

(c)    what the names of the employers for the jobs created are. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply:  Resumption of Debate: (Head 77/01: under consideration): (Mr Ng’onga). Heads 77/02, 77/03, 77/04, 77/05, 77/06, 77/08, 77/09, 33/01, 33/02, 33/04, 33/05, 33/06, 45/01, 45/02, 45/03, 45/04, 45/05, 45/06, 45/07, 45/10, 45/11, 45/12, 45/13, 45/14, 45/15, 45/16, 45/17, 45/18, 45/19 and 78/01 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 77    -    Ministry of Defence Head 33    -    Ministry of Commerce, Trade and Industry Head 45    -    Ministry of Community Development, Mother and Child Health Head 78    -    Zambia Security Intelligence Services – Office of the President
